name: GeniusJunior
0:
”Alexa, start Genius Junior”
”Alexa, ask Genius Junior for help”
”Alexa, open Genius Junior”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: genius junior
des:
Genius Junior is an Alexa Skill for kids to train their brain using extraordinary math challenges.
Along with kids, parents can also play this for fun. This skill can also be used at school level for kids as well. 

This skill has three levels, in which it will ask different combination of basic math operators (i.e. +, -, x, /).

In the current version we have included addition and substraction only.

We are working on next levels which will include division, multiplication between two and more than two numbers. Stay tuned for upcoming levels :)

Level details:
Level 1 -- Includes addition and substraction between two nubers from 0 to 9
Level 2 -- Includes addition and substraction between two nubers from 0 to 99
Level 3 -- Includes addition and substraction between two nubers from 0 to 1000

To start just say,
Alexa, start Genius junior

You can also ask for 'help' via saying 'help' and also select level via 'level one'. 
There are total three levels (one, two and three). You can select any of above.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
